title: Fetch and Display Saved Plans
description: Implement a feature to fetch and display saved plans in a dedicated section within the File Explorer Sidebar.
acceptance_criteria: The File Explorer Sidebar includes a new section specifically dedicated to displaying saved plans.
The frontend application fetches a list of saved plans from the backend.
The fetched plans are displayed in the new Sidebar section, allowing users to easily browse and access them.
Each plan displayed in the Sidebar includes relevant information, such as the plan title and a brief description.
Users can click on a displayed plan to open it in the chat history for review and further interaction.
The Sidebar section is dynamically updated when new plans are saved or deleted, reflecting the latest state of saved plans.
